Package model.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.cards.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Archaeologist, Assistant, Digger, Professor
    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a Card of the game. A card can either be [Assistant,Archaeologist,Digger,Professor].

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        protected Card​(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String effect,
               Player owner)
        "Constructor" for the Card class used to initialize its attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - The card's name
        owner - The card's owner Precondition: Name is any one of the following : [Assistant,Archaeologist,Digger,Professor] & owner is an instance of Player Postcondition: The attributes of the class are initialized using the passed values.

        Accessor function which returns the card's owner.

      • getEffect

        public java.lang.String getEffect()
        Accessor function which returns the card's effect.
        Returns:

      • hasBeenPlayed

        public boolean hasBeenPlayed()
        Observer function which returns whether the card has been played.
        Returns:
        True if the card has been played, false otherwise.

      • setHasBeenPlayed

        public void setHasBeenPlayed​(boolean hasBeenPlayed)
        Transformer function which updates the card's played status.
        Parameters:
        hasBeenPlayed - The value to update the card's played status with. Precondition: hasBeenPlayed is true or false. Postcondition: The card's played status will be updated.
